## Load libraries
```{r}
library(GGally)
library(skimr)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

# look at it ----

view(penguins)
names(penguins)

# check dimensions ----
dim(penguins)

# get summary ----
summary(penguins)

skim(penguins)

# print first 6 rows ----
head(penguins)

# print last 6 rows ----
tail(penguins)

# make a pairplot
ggpairs(penguins)

# make pairsplot w/ species by color and select columns ----
GGally:ggpairs(penguins, column = 3:6, ggplot2::aes(colour = species))
```
